features: Set Includes: 18.9oz Baby Powder Natural Body Wash (Argan Oil, Avocado Oil, Aloe Vera Oil & Coconut Oil) 16oz (1lb) Baby Powder Scented Bath Salts (Dead Sea Salt + Epsom Salt infused with essential Oils) BABY POWDER is a classic, light, fresh, powdery scent. The nostalgic and instantly recognizable scent of baby powder. Highlighted with notes of ozone, orange blossom and delicate florals over a base of cedar and powdery musk.

PLANT-BASED MOISTURIZER: Enriched with a luxurious blend of natural oils, our body wash is formulated to deeply hydrate and replenish your skin. Argan oil, rich in antioxidants and essential fatty acids, helps nourish and protect your skin, promoting a youthful radiance. Aloe vera oil soothes and hydrates, while avocado oil and coconut oil provide intense moisturization, leaving your skin feeling silky smooth and baby-soft.

NOURISHES THE DRIEST SKIN: Experience the gentle yet effective cleansing properties of our Baby Powder Body Wash. The pH-balanced formula effectively removes impurities while maintaining the natural moisture balance of your skin. Enjoy the peace of mind knowing that our body wash is free from harsh chemicals, sulfates, and parabens, making it suitable for even the most sensitive skin

REJUVENATING AND DETOXIFYING: Our Baby powder Scented Bath Salts are carefully crafted to revitalize and detoxify your body. Epsom salts, known for their high magnesium content, help relax muscles, ease tension, and promote overall well-being. Recharge your body and mind with the invigorating benefits of our bath salts, leaving you feeling refreshed and renewed after every soak.

DEAD SEA SALT MAGIC: Experience the wonders of Dead Sea salts, revered for their therapeutic properties since ancient times. Packed with essential minerals such as magnesium, calcium, and potassium, they help improve skin health by nourishing and hydrating it. Dead Sea salts gently exfoliate, removing dead skin cells, leaving your skin feeling soft, smooth, and rejuvenated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this shower gel. It doesn't smell much like Lavender to me. It's very fresh smelling. It's excellent when it comes to removing thick oils. It doesn't leave my skin feeling dry which is awesome. I would buy more of this in any scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good body wash
reviews.reviewText: Product comes in a good size bottle. Has different oils to hydrate skin. Nice light powder smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It smells sooo good! The best baby powder scent. It cleans very well, pretty much squeaky clean. It’s not a super sudsy wash, but just enough. It’s my new favorite body wash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: Product didn't meet my expectations as described in advertisement. I returned it without issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pleasant to use
reviews.reviewText: This soap smells really good while you’re using it but it doesn’t leave any scent behind. That was a little disappointing because I like everything else about it. It lathers up nice and rinses easy. It doesn’t leave your skin feeling like there’s something on it like moisturizing soaps can. You don’t have to use a lot of it to get enough lather. It’s a really nice soap. If you prefer your soap to not leave any scent you’re going to love it.My skin feels nice and soft too. Smooth. It’s gentle and hydrating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good
reviews.reviewText: This smells fantastic and feels so good on the skin. I have eczema and it was non drying and non irritating. Gives a good lather and rinses cleanly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Natural ingredients that I can read and understand without compromising my clean.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this body wash to try because of it having minimal ingredients. Unlike store bought body washes, this product is made with mostly natural ingredients and a small ingredients list. I’ve been trying to make a change to more eco friendly and natural products. The rose scent smells amazing, and it lasts for a good bit too and doesn’t disappear immediately. It’s a natural rose scent and very light- not too overpowering. The wash lathers well and I feel like I get a good clean after using it. With natural oils in the ingredients, I do not feel like it dries out my skin after use. (like how a bar of soap would) the body wash comes in a pump bottle, it’s a very good size and the pump works very well. Overall: I’m very pleased with this product and will be buying more scents. It gets me just as clean as any other body wash but with an ingredients list that I can easily read and know what is going onto my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Rose scent smells like artificial
reviews.reviewText: This body soap is made from only plant based oil!? The list of ingredients indicates only oil, how can it be foamed? Plus it doesn’t say anything rose, that’s weird. I love the smell but it smells like artificial fragrance. The seller should be clear about the ingredients. I will see after I use it for 1 week so i can see if I get allergic reactions.
